description:
Welcome to Shahid – Your Ultimate Entertainment Destination

Dive into the world of endless entertainment with Shahid, the leading platform for the best Arabic Originals, exclusive series, blockbuster movies, live TV, sports, and so much more. Whether you’re watching for free or subscribing to one of Shahid’s packages, you’ll gain unlimited access to a world of premium content tailored just for you.

Why Choose Shahid?

Exclusive Arabic Originals

Enjoy the finest Arabic Original productions available exclusively on Shahid. From gripping dramas to captivating comedies, we bring you stories that resonate with your heart.

Live Sports in HD

Catch the thrill of the biggest international sports and regional tournaments, all in stunning HD (Available in MENA region only.)

Unmissable Live Events

Stay entertained with iconic events like Riyadh Season, Jeddah Season, live concerts, and theatrical plays.

Ad-Free Streaming

Enjoy uninterrupted, non-stop entertainment when you subscribe. Say goodbye to ads and hello to seamless viewing.

Live TV Channels

Watch your favorite channels in crystal-clear Full HD and stay on top of the latest news, entertainment, and more.

Exclusive Movie & Series Premieres

Be the first to watch the latest series and movies before they hit TV or cinemas.

A World of Genres

From heart-pounding horror and thrilling dramas to laugh-out-loud comedies and enchanting romance, Shahid’s vast library has something for everyone. Explore Egyptian classics, Turkish sensations, and captivating foreign series at your fingertips.

Family-Friendly Content

Secure profiles and exclusive kids’ content ensure entertainment for all ages in a safe and dedicated environment.

Features You’ll Love

Create Personalized Profiles: Assign unique profiles to each family member for a tailored viewing experience.

Build Your Watchlist: Save your favorite shows and movies for easy access anytime.

Download & Watch Offline: Take your entertainment on the go by downloading content to watch without an internet connection.

Why Shahid is Perfect for You

A constantly updated media library keeps you up-to-date with the latest blockbusters and trending series.

Instant access to a global selection of TV favorites, tailored for you.

Effortlessly browse curated categories for every mood and preference.

Personalized recommendations and updates so you never miss a thing.

Download the Shahid app now and explore our unlimited benefits and perks. Immerse yourself in a world of award-winning movies, trending series, and captivating live events—all in ultimate quality and comfort. Once you start, you’ll be hooked.

Enjoy access to the best movies, series, and live entertainment awaits—don’t miss out!

 

Privacy Policy: https://www.mbc.net/en/privacy-policy

Terms of Use: https://shahid.mbc.net/ar/terms-and-conditions

Dive into ShortMax, the prime video app for short dramas, movies, and reels! Perfect for quick breaks, commutes, or late-night binge sessions, our app delivers engaging stories in minutes.
Step into the realm of ShortMax, where an array of engaging short dramas and movies awaits your exploration. Immerse yourself in a diverse range of episodes and elevate your drama experience to new heights.
Indulge in a Tapestry of Genres
With ShortMax, you'll relish an assortment of genres spanning drama, romance, suspense, and thrilling mysteries. Embark on time-travel adventures, unravel enigmatic cases, or get swept away in the fantasy of romance with a pretend billionaire. Our collection of stories is as vast as your imagination!
Lose Yourself in Miniature Dramas
In just minutes, you'll be completely absorbed in these enthralling short narratives, igniting your passion for drama like never before.
Unveiling Exclusive Selection
ShortMax proudly presents a meticulously curated assortment of short plays. Each episode is carefully crafted, brimming with creativity, emotion, and depth, designed to transport you effortlessly into a multitude of imaginative realms.
Here's What Awaits You on ShortMax:
- An Array of Genres
From inspirational comebacks to enigmatic time-travel adventures, from the allure of ancient tales to modern love stories, ShortMax caters to every drama preference you desire.
- Tailored Recommendations
Our smart recommendation system ensures you easily find shows tailored to your tastes.
- Effortless Viewing Experience
With each short drama lasting just minutes, you can seamlessly enjoy them during your commute, breaks, or moments of leisure.
- Exclusive Original Content
Engage with bite-sized, drama-packed original shows that will keep you coming back for more. The entertainment never stops!
- Always Fresh
Stay up-to-date with real-time updates, ensuring a steady stream of the hottest short dramas and movies. Discover new favorites every week!
- Offline Download
Enjoy your downloaded content anytime, anywhere, even when you're offline.
- Your One-Stop Platform
ShortMax simplifies your viewing journey by providing a unified platform, eliminating the inconvenience of switching between sources.
- Visual Brilliance
Delight in high-definition visuals that capture every detail, creating an immersive feast for your eyes.
Embrace ShortMax as your gateway to the world of short dramas and movies, where limitless possibilities await. Download now and embark on an exhilarating journey through a universe of captivating short dramas, immersing yourself in the drama-watching experience!

Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!
Choose between a one-month subscription or auto-renewal subscription to enjoy special LIVE benefits (currently only available in limited regions)

GoodShort: a must-have app for original dramas and movies

To enjoy original short dramas and movies of a minute or so, anytime, anywhere, whether in travel, at home, or at a restaurant

We have a myriad of short dramas and movies adapted from novels with high quality, high definition, and high update frequency, guaranteeing a different screen experience for you.

[Diverse, all-inclusive content]
There are a lot of short dramas and reels adapted from novels, definitely something fascinating to you. From modern romance, urban romance, and youth romance to live-in sons-in-law, magic doctors, CEOs, billionaires, queens, and gods of war, all your favorite genres and themes can be found here!

[A personalized list of works you may like]
The excellent recommendation system will help you find the best originals, short dramas, and short movies adapted from the hottest novels, meeting the preferences of all kinds of drama and movie lovers!

[A user-friendly, elegant interface]
The simple, clear, user-friendly interface is an ergonomic fit for your eyes.

[Smooth experience]
Smooth streaming, as well as the comfortable interface design, will give you unparalleled viewing enjoyment. The high-quality content output provides a rich, high-definition, smooth, and flawless screen experience.

[Unlimited resources, super fast updates]
The selected, diversified content will satisfy your viewing needs for different content. Subscribe to your favorite works to keep up with the latest updates of your favorite dramas.

Whether you want to relax or pass the time while waiting, GoodShort is the best choice for you. Download it and start exploring!

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodShort to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

We are looking forward to hearing your comments and ideas. Please email us at contact@goodshort.com

Tired of never finishing a movie or paying for unused subscriptions? 

Watch ReelShort — Every Second is Drama

Say hello to ReelShort, a next-gen HD streaming short movie platform offering exclusive vertical TV mini series. Recognized by Times100 for our movie reels innovation in the entertainment industry, we're changing the way you watch movies with our one-minute short movie episodes that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere, all from the convenience of your phone with the ReelShort App.

Choose from our TV mini series library packed with endless addictive movie shorts added daily, from romantic encounters with billionaires and heart-wrenching tragedies to epic comeback stories and more—you won't ever be short on short movie entertainment!

Featured Shows:
[Don't Miss Me When I'm Gone] After losing my parents, I move in with my godmother, Aunt Sandra. I live under her roof with her two sons-the Miller brothers-surrounded by love and care. I think I’ll end up with one of them. But everything changes when the maid’s daughter, Lola, moves in. The Miller brother I love most breaks my heart into pieces. After I leave, they lose their minds trying to find me.

[Move Aside! I'm the Final Boss] Kingsley is the secret King of King's Corps and the richest man on Earth, but when he returns from the battlefield, his childhood sweetheart brutally dumps him, thinking he's a clown. How will the King of all men make her regret it?

Here's why you'll love ReelShort:

Bite-sized original movie shorts designed for on-the-go viewing
•Exclusive short movies with juicy vertical content that will keep you hooked
•New TV mini series added daily, with hundreds of new episodes each month
•Hollywood-quality entertainment, crafted for the big screen delivered to your small screen
•The first ever interactive live action short movies, where you decide what happens next
Experience the future of short movie entertainment, one minute at a time — download ReelShort now!

"Crazy Maple Studio is quietly changing the streaming game with its ReelShort app." - Time100 

"The biggest player in this new genre is ReelShort." - New York Times

"Every minute has a hook that keeps you watching." - Wall Street Journal

"ReelShort, which has dozens of shows — similarly light on character development and packed with curveballs — made for binge-watching in minutes." - Washington Post

What makes 'Joy Awards' truly special, as it does every year, is that the winners are chosen by the fans who love and cherish them. With the 'Joy Awards' App, it's you who will nominate and vote for your beloved stars and releases in Music, Cinema, Series, Directors, Sports, and Influencers, all for free!



You will nominate and cast your votes in two phases:




First Phase: Nominating Your Favorite Stars and Releases
In the nomination phase, which lasts for one month, you play a crucial role in shaping the competition. 
Here's where YOU come in – choose your favorite nominee from the names or titles listed in each category. If your top pick isn't there, don't worry! You have the chance to add your own favorite name or title, as long as it meets the terms and conditions: it should be a release or achievement from 2025. 
During the nomination phase, you can nominate only once for each category.
This phase eventually leads to the selection of the top four final nominees in each category, representing the stars and releases with the most nominations.
 
Second Phase: Voting for Your Favorite Stars and Releases
After the nominations have been counted, the voting phase begins with the top four nominees in each category, which also spans one month.
Here's where YOU make the difference – cast your votes for your favorite nominees. 
And a month later, the voting counts are gathered, leading to the grand reveal of the winners during the live "Joy Awards 2026" ceremony in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
During the voting phase, you can vote only once for each category.

Tired of swiping endlessly with no real connections?
Looking for a social app that’s fast, authentic, and actually works? Welcome to SOYOU—the platform designed to help you meet real people, build genuine connections, and find your meaningful friends without the wait!

From strangers to friends, and maybe more!
At SOYOU, we believe every great friendship starts with a simple “hello.” Whether you’re looking for a online chatter, a meaningful friend, or daily meet, our platform makes it easy to break the ice and build real connections. Share your interests, join community groups, and discover people who truly get you.

With SOYOU, you can:
Explore faceless socializing—Hide your identity and focus on personality, making connections based on who you truly are.
Connect instantly—Our smart algorithm pairs you with like-minded people in seconds, so you can start chatting right away.
Chat with verified users—No bots, no fakes, just real profiles and authentic conversations.
Stay safe and private—End-to-end encryption and anonymous mode ensure your chats are secure and your secrets stay yours.
Meet nearby—Priority local connections mean you’re never far from your next great date.
Be active 24/7—Whether it’s day or night, there’s always someone online to chat with.
Join voice chat rooms—Jump into lively group conversations, share stories, and meet new friends in real-time voice chats.

Why wait?
Join thousands of users who’ve already found meaningful friends on SOYOU. Whether you’re looking for a casual chat, a deep conversation, or a lifelong friendship, every interaction brings you closer to someone special. Download now and start your journey to real, quality connections today!

Buz TV - Movies & TV Shows is an unofficial informational tool that helps you stay up to date with movie and TV release dates.
You cannot watch or stream content in this app — Tubee is strictly for tracking and discovery.

Quickly find upcoming release dates, get notified about schedule changes, follow your favorite actors, and stay informed about the entertainment you love.

With Buz TV, you’ll always be the first to know when a new season or episode is announced!

---

##  Features

*  Set Reminders for your favorite series and movie release dates.
*  Notifications for new seasons, episodes, and production changes.
*  Follow Actors and get notified about new shows and movies they’re in.
*  Smart Subscriptions to help you save on streaming services.
*  Track Watched Progress for your movies and TV shows.
*  Favorites List for easy access to shows and movies you love.
*  Watch Trailers directly in the app.
*  Browse & Search by title, popularity, rating, or release date.
*  Filter Content by type (Series, Movies, Documentaries) or upcoming release dates.
*  Chat & Discuss your favorite shows, seasons, and episodes with the community.

---

## Subscription Info

Tubee is free with ads. Upgrade to Tubee Pro to:

* Remove ads
* Unlock Smart Subscriptions
* Get Premium Notifications
* Access unlimited favorites and follows

Please note: Tubee Pro does not provide streaming. It’s an informational upgrade only.

Subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage or cancel auto-renewal anytime in your iTunes Store account settings.

---

## Credits

All metadata, artwork, and images are sourced from TMDb (The Movie Database), a community-maintained movie and TV database.

app_name: Hl Tv : All movies & Tv Shows
description:
Hl TV is your go-to movie app, designed to enhance your cinematic journey. Discover the latest blockbusters and upcoming releases with ease, thanks to a sleek, user-friendly interface and reliable data powered by themoviedb.org.

Key Features:

- Upcoming Releases at Your Fingertips
Stay up to date with the most anticipated films hitting theaters soon.

Smart Discovery & Exploration
Dive into a vast collection of movies with rich details on cast, crew, genres, and more.

Accurate, Real-Time Data
Access comprehensive and up-to-date information directly from the trusted themoviedb.org database.

Release Dates & Trailers
Plan your movie nights effortlessly by browsing release dates and watching trailers—all within the app.

Personalized Watchlist
Keep track of movies you want to see by curating your own custom watchlist.

Streamlined & Intuitive Interface
Navigate effortlessly through a clean, modern design that makes movie discovery a breeze.

No Account Required
HL TV respects your privacy—no sign-up, login, or personal information is needed to enjoy the app’s core features.

اكتشف تجربة مشاهدة متكاملة مع تطبيق قصة عشق، المنصة العربية العصرية التي تجمع بين التكنولوجيا الذكية والمحتوى الغني لتلبية شغف عشاق السينما والتلفاز. بفضل تصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام، يوفّر لك التطبيق قصه عشق مسلسلات تركيه كل ما تحتاجه لاستكشاف أحدث وأشهر الأعمال من تركيا، الوطن العربي، آسيا، والعالم أجمع.

نحن لسنا مجرد تطبيق تتبع عادي. نحن رحلتك الرومانسية في عالم الدراما، حيث كل فيلم قصة حب، وكل مسلسل مغامرة عاطفية. دع عجلة تقودك لاكتشاف دراما تلامس قلبك!

هل تحتار في اختيار فيلم أو مسلسل لمشاهدته الليلة؟ دع عجلة الساحرة تختار لك! تطبيق متكامل يجمع بين تتبع الأفلام والمسلسلات مع لمسة رومانسية فريدة.


المميزات الرئيسية:

عجلة السحرية


دوّر العجلة واترك الحظ يختار دراما الليلة

رسوم متحركة ساحرة ومؤثرات احتفالية

اختيار ذكي من قائمتك المفضلة


مكتبة شاملة للأفلام والمسلسلات


تصفح آلاف الأفلام والمسلسلات

معلومات مفصلة مع التقييمات والمراجعات

تصنيفات متنوعة: رائجة، شعبية، الأعلى تقييماً

بحث سريع ودقيق


تنظيم مثالي لقوائمك


قائمة المفضلة لأجمل ما شاهدت

قائمة المشاهدة لما تنوي مشاهدته

تتبع ما شاهدته بالفعل

إحصائيات شخصية مفصلة


اختبار المعرفة السينمائية


اختبر معرفتك بعالم السينما والدراما

أسئلة متنوعة وممتعة

تحديات يومية ونقاط تنافسية

شارك نتائجك مع أصدقائك



واجهة داكنة أنيقة وعصرية

ألوان حمراء دافئة تعكس

تجربة مستخدم سلسة وممتعة

دعم كامل للغة العربية


تحديثات مستمرة


محتوى محدث يومياً

أحدث الإصدارات السينمائية

تنبيهات للحلقات الجديدة


لماذا عجلة؟

نحن لسنا مجرد تطبيق تتبع عادي. نحن رحلتك الرومانسية في عالم الدراما، حيث كل فيلم قصة حب، وكل مسلسل مغامرة عاطفية. دع عجلة تقودك لاكتشاف دراما تلامس قلبك!

حمّل التطبيق الآن وابدأ رحلتك في عالم السينمائي!

اكتشف تجربة مشاهدة متكاملة مع تطبيق قصة عشق، المنصة العربية العصرية التي تجمع بين التكنولوجيا الذكية والمحتوى الغني لتلبية شغف عشاق السينما والتلفاز. بفضل تصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام، يوفّر لك التطبيق قصه عشق مسلسلات تركيه كل ما تحتاجه لاستكشاف أحدث وأشهر الأعمال من تركيا، الوطن العربي، آسيا، والعالم أجمع.

أبرز المزايا:
استكشاف المحتوى بسهولة: تصفّح أحدث الأفلام والمسلسلات العربية، التركية، مسلسلات كورية، والآسيوية، مترجمة ومدبلجة بجودة عالية.

توصيات ذكية: يقدّم لك التطبيق اقتراحات مخصصة تناسب ذوقك بناءً على تفاعلاتك.

تقييمات ومراجعات: اطّلع على آراء المستخدمين، شارك تقييماتك، وتعرّف على أفضل الأعمال.

تصنيفات متنوعة: أكشن، دراما، كوميديا، أنيميشن، عائلي، والكثير من التصنيفات التي تناسب جميع الأذواق.

دليل شامل للمحتوى الرمضاني والعربي: معلومات محدثة حول أبرز مسلسلات رمضان والأعمال الكلاسيكية والمعاصرة.

قائمة مشاهداتي: أنشئ قائمة خاصة بك لتتبع ما شاهدته وما ترغب بمشاهدته لاحقًا.

تنويه هام:

تطبيق موقع قصة عشق مخصص لاستعراض وتصفح معلومات الأفلام والمسلسلات فقط. وجميع الحقوق محفوظة لأصحابها الأصليين.
تم تصميم التطبيق بهدف تقديم معلومات محدثة وشاملة حول الأعمال السينمائية والتلفزيونية الجديدة والكلاسيكية من مصادر متنوعة وموثوقة.

Welcome to DramaBite – Hot Short Drama Hub in the U.S.!
DramaBite is your ultimate destination for immersive short drama experiences, designed to ensure everyone finds their perfect series. Whether you’re a fan of gripping tales or lighthearted stories, DramaBite has something for everyone!
Explore a vast world of diverse short dramas, including genres like millionaire fantasies, revenge sagas, heartfelt romances, and touching family stories. Love binge-watching? You’ll never run out of favorites here.
Worried about choosing from our extensive collection? Don’t worry, our "For You" Recommendation System is here to help, offering tailored drama picks based on your unique taste, anytime and anywhere.
Why Choose DramaBite?
1. Diverse Drama Genres: Whether you’re in the mood for thrilling revenge plots, sweet romances, or heartwarming family dramas, DramaBite has an expansive selection to suit every taste. With genres ranging from fantasy to suspense, you’ll always find something to match your mood.
2. "For You" Recommendation System: Our smart recommendation system is designed to make finding your next favorite drama effortless. By learning from your viewing history and preferences, it suggests shows that align with your unique taste, ensuring you spend less time browsing and more time watching what you love.
3. Seamless Viewing Experience: Enjoy an uninterrupted, smooth streaming experience with zero buffering. Watch your favorite dramas with fast loading times and high-quality streaming, ensuring every scene looks its best, no matter where you are.
4. Language-Specific Subtitles: Stay fully immersed in the story with accurate subtitles in multiple languages, allowing you to follow along effortlessly. Whether you're watching a drama in English or another language, we make sure nothing gets lost in translation.
5. High-Definition Video Quality: DramaBite provides high-definition video streaming, offering a sharp and visually stunning viewing experience. Every detail of your favorite short dramas is brought to life with crystal-clear quality, elevating your drama-watching experience.
6. Global Drama Collection: Dive into a collection of top-rated dramas from around the world. Whether you’re in the mood for a British crime thriller, a romantic K-drama, or a suspenseful European mini-series, DramaBite brings the best global content to your screen, all in one app.
7. Constant Exploration and Growth: DramaBite is always expanding and improving. We’re committed to bringing you fresh, exciting, and innovative content, keeping you up-to-date with the latest trends and keeping your drama journey exciting and new.
Download DramaBite now and dive into the hottest platform for short dramas, where an endless world of captivating stories is waiting just for you!

Dramabite Auto-Renewable Subscription:
1.Subscription service: Dramabite Weekly Subscription (7 days); Monthly Subscription (1 month); Annual Subscription (12 months). All are auto-renewable.
2.Subscription price: Based on IAP application information, e.g., Annual subscription $199.99.
3.Payment: Subscriptions are managed by the user. After confirmation of purchase and payment, the amount will be charged to the iTunes account.
4.Renewal: The Apple iTunes account will be charged within 24 hours before expiration. Once charged, the subscription will be extended for another period.
5.Canceling renewal: To cancel the subscription, open "Settings" on your Apple device → go to "iTunes Store & App Store" → tap "Apple ID" → select "View Apple ID" → go to "Account Settings" → tap "Subscriptions" → select "Dramabite" to cancel the subscription. If the subscription is not canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the billing period, it will renew automatically.
Terms of Use: https://m.miniepisode.media/miniepisode-mobile/routine/termsAndRules/index.html

Our premium service offers three types of subscriptions: weekly, annual, and lifetime.
Only weekly and annual subscriptions support auto-renewal. When auto-renewal is triggered, your account will be automatically charged for the renewal 24 hours prior to the end of the current billing period.
To cancel auto-renewal, go to your account settings at least 24 hours before the renewal date and turn off auto-renewal. This can be done at any time, without any time limit.

EXPERIENCE FOOTBALL - ROAD TO QATAR
Your official gateway to the world’s most exciting football tournaments. This app is built for fans who want the game at their fingertips, fast, simple, and stress-free.

Inspire your children to uncover their unique interests
Help your children explore video content that they love and that parents trust, in an app made just for children. With easy navigation tools and a suite of features, you can help your children spend time online uncovering new interests, unleashing their imagination and building their confidence in their own unique world.

Help your children grow at their own pace
Your children are unique, so they should only see content that they're ready to explore. Decide what videos will help them make the most of their time online, then personalise individual profiles using custom content filters as they grow.

– Help your youngest children learn their ABCs, nurture their curiosity and more in 'Preschool' mode.
– Expand your children's interests to songs, cartoons or DIY crafts in 'Younger' mode.
– Give your older children the freedom to search popular music and gaming videos in 'Older' mode.
– Or, hand-pick the videos, channels and collections that your children can see in 'Approved content only' mode.

Rewatch videos and bond over favourites
Quickly find your children's favourite videos and the content that you've shared with them in the 'Watch it again' tab.

Shape your children's viewing experience with parental controls
Parental control features help you limit what your children watch, and better guide their viewing experience. Our blocking process aims to help keep videos on YouTube Kids family-friendly and safe – but each family's preferences are unique. Don't like a video or channel, or see inappropriate content? Flag it for our team to review.

Set a screen-time limit
Encourage your children to take a break in between exploring content. Use the 'Timer' feature to freeze the app when screen time is up so that your children can apply their new skills to the real world.

See important information
– Parental setup is needed to ensure the best experience for your family.
– Children may see commercial content from YouTube creators that are not paid ads.
– See the Privacy Notice for Google Accounts managed with Family Link for information on our privacy practices for signing in with a Google Account.
– If your children use the app without signing in with their Google Account, the YouTube Kids Privacy Notice applies.

Loppi is your laid-back gaming corner — a place to unwind with easy games and capture the joy
of simple play. Whether you’ve got a few minutes or just need a break, Loppi makes it easy to
jump into fun rounds and enjoy quick, casual play.

- Play Anytime, Anywhere
Join or host lighthearted matches like Tic Tac Toe and Rock Paper Scissors. It’s all about tapping
into fun, wherever you are.

- Simple to Learn, Fun to Master
Classic games with a fresh twist — easy to start, hard to stop. Just a tap and you’re in.

- Celebrate Game Moments
Highlight your favorite rounds and save memorable plays. Capture joyful, spontaneous moments
in your own way.

- Invite Others to Play
Send a playful game invite with a tap. It’s casual, optional, and focused purely on fun — no profiles
or matching involved.

-Your Game Journal
See your gameplay history in one place. It’s your own lighthearted log of fun sessions and mini
victories.

Loppi is made for casual entertainment — where light games turn into real smiles. Download now
and enjoy your next joyful break.
